channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: It's the call of home that's luring today's couple to head to the beautiful landscape of South Yorkshire, and Alistair Appleton is supporting them on their house hunting journey. With a ?450k budget, they want a home with enough room to welcome family and future grandchildren. Aside from property, Alistair meets a national sled dog champion and takes the reins on a high-octane race through the Yorkshire woodland.
